item.title: [Python] Introduction to electronic paper module
item.description: #Introduction Combining ready-made products in the shortest possible time, The purpose is to create a prototype that allows you to customize the content displayed on the electronic paper. It’s just a prototype, so I don’t think about costs or operation costs. Things to prepare Raspberry Pi WH Zero WH 1 A similar product is the Raspberry Pi Zero W. Raspberry Pi Zero WH is a model with pin header mounted on Raspberry Pi Zero W.

item.title: [Python] Judging the loss of Shadowba by image recognition
item.description: --- This article is a relay article of “2020 New Year Advent Calendar TechConnect!“ofLinkInformationSystem is. TechConnect! is a self-starting advent calendar relayed by a self-made group called engineer.hanzomon. (From [Link here] Facebook) Since the theme was free, it will be a free article. (The technique used is serious.) I made good use of the tutorial and did image recognition. Done A program to detect Win/Lose of Shadowverse (Steam version) has been created.
